Residential Filters System Explore our range of filters designed packages for residential use. Package 1: Multimedia
Four Stages
A multimedia filter removes suspended solids from water by using multiple layers of media.
Package 2: Multimedia Softener Four Stages
Reduces water hardness by removing calcium and magnesium, protecting appliances and fixtures from scaling or from the build of hard water marks.
Package 3: Multimedia Softener Four Stages with Mini RO
An electric or battery-powered mechanism that automates the purification process.
Package 4: Multimedia Carbon Softener Four Stages
Provides a reservoir for your water source in case of a failure in the main water supply, such as water interruption and unstable water pressure.
See more
Commercial Filters System Water filtration systems for commercial. Package 1: Multimedia Softener Four Stage with 400gpd Reverse Osmosis
Advanced water softening and reverse osmosis technology.
Package 2:  3000 GPD Single Membrane Reverse Osmosis (Refilling Station)
Advanced water purification solution designed for refilling station applications.
Package 3:   6000 GPD Dual Membrane Reverse Osmosis (Refilling Station)
High-capacity water purification solution tailored for refilling stations and commercial applications.
See more
Industrial Filters System Advanced water filtration systems for businesses. Package 1:  Industrial Reverse Osmosis
High-capacity water filtration solution designed for large-scale commercial applications, particularly for refilling stations, industrial use, and community water supply needs. Package 2:   Industrial Filtration System
designed to handle large volumes of water efficiently while providing exceptional filtration performance

Commercial Packages
Package #1
Multimedia Softener Four Stages With 400gpd Mini Reverse Osmosis
Advanced water softening and reverse osmosis technology. It features four filtration stages to reduce sediment, chlorine, and impurities while softening water for improved taste and reduced scaling. The 400 GPD capacity ensures a steady supply of clean water for residential or small commercial use, offering a compact and efficient solution for high-quality water.
Check the product
Package #2
3000 GPD Single Membrane Reverse Osmosis (Water Refilling Station)
The 3000 gpd reverse osmosis system stands as a pivotal solution in the realm of water purification, catering to a variety of commercial and industrial needs. This system is engineered to efficiently remove impurities and contaminants from water, making it suitable for a wide range of applications
Check the product
Package #3
6000 GPD Dual Membrane Reverse Osmosis (Water Refilling Station)
6000 GPD industrial RO system utilizes reverse osmosis technology to purify large volumes of water, making it ideal for industrial settings where high-quality water is essential. Its advanced filtration system effectively removes impurities, dissolved solids, and contaminants from the feed water, ensuring a reliable supply of clean water for various industrial applications. With its robust design and efficient purification capabilities, this system offers a cost-effective solution for industries such as manufacturing, food processing, pharmaceuticals, and more, where water quality is crucial for operations and product quality
Check the product
Package #4
9000 GPD Triple Membrane Reverse Osmosis (Water Refilling Station)
A robust system that uses three layers of membrane purification to ensure clean drinking water. It's perfectly suited for both residential and commercial settings, offering a balance between thorough filtration and efficient water production.
Check the product
Package #5
12000 GPD Quad Membrane Reverse Osmosis (Water Refilling Station)
Includes a water reservoir to safeguard your water source during main water supply failures, such as interruptions and unstable water pressure. Paired with our advanced Multimedia 4-Stage Filtration System, it guarantees a consistent supply of clean water for crucial hygiene, cooking, and sanitation purposes.
Check the product
